name: Partha Pratim Das
content: Prof. Partha Pratim Das Partha Pratim Das Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur Office: Room No 122 Quarter: B-146 Phone: +91-3222-281998 Research interests Object-oriented analysis and design Software engineering Image processing Digital geometry Electronic design automation Courses 2013 Autumn: Programming and Data Structure (CS11001) Lectures Introduction: Variables, Constants and Input/Outputs Expressions and Assignments Conditional Statements Looping 1-d Arrays Functions Recursion Structures Number Representations Polynomial -- Practice Problem Pointer: Basics Pointers and Arrays Pointers: Parameter Passing and Return Dynamic Memory Allocation 2-d Arrays Linked List Sorting File Handling Stack and Queue Important Notice Class-Test-1 Announcement Question-Paper & Solutions Marks (All Sections) Schedule for showing Class Test 1 copies Mid-Semester Question-Paper & Solutions Marks (All Sections) Schedule for showing Mid-Sem copies Class-Test-2 Announcement Question-Paper & Solutions Marks (All Sections) Schedule for showing Class Test 2 copies End-Semester Question-Paper & Solutions Marks (All Sections)
